cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.4)

project("Catecophony")


list(APPEND CMAKE_MODULE_PATH "${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/../../../../../FRUT/prefix/FRUT/cmake")
include(Reprojucer)


set(Catecophony_jucer_FILE
  "${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/Catecophony.jucer"
)


set(JUCE_MODULES_GLOBAL_PATH "/Users/benhayes/JUCE/modules")

  NAMES essentia libessentia
  HINTS "/usr/local/lib"

  PROJECT_VERSION "0.0.1"

  NAME "Debug"
  DEBUG_MODE ON
)
